name: Girls Gym
description:
Probably every person at least once in his life dreamed of wearing glasses in which you will see all the girls naked. Make that dream come true in Girls Gym! Put on your glasses and watch beautiful naked girls train! Relaxing music will let you immerse yourself in this process.

In the first-person game, you have to put on glasses that allow you to see all the girls naked! With relaxing music, immerse yourself in this exciting process. See all the girls without exception! You also have the option to switch to the slow-motion effect to further view the whole process of training naked girls! Get the most out of this game!

Features of the game:
As many as 7 girls!
Relaxing music and cool atmosphere!
Catchy, intuitive gameplay!
Nice exercise to watch!
Very beautiful graphics!
